types:type.name: Paymethod
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Paymethod = {| first_name: String, last_name: String, bank_routing_number: String, bank_account_number: String, bank_account_type: String, bank_account_holder_type: String |} {"example": "{\\\"first_name\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"last_name\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"bank_routing_number\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"bank_account_number\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"bank_account_type\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"bank_account_holder_type\\\":\\\"\\\"}"}

types:type.name: PaymethodMessage
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type PaymethodMessage = {| payment_method: {| bank_account: {| first_name: String, last_name: String, bank_routing_number: String, bank_account_number: String, bank_account_type: String, bank_account_holder_type: String |} |} |} {"example": "{\\\"payment_method\\\":{\\\"bank_account\\\":{\\\"first_name\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"last_name\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"bank_routing_number\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"bank_account_number\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"bank_account_type\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"bank_account_holder_type\\\":\\\"\\\"}}}"}

types:type.name: Compra
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Compra = {| payment_method_token: String, amount: Number {"typeId": "int"}, currency_code: String |} {"example": "{\\\"payment_method_token\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"amount\\\":0,\\\"currency_code\\\":\\\"\\\"}"}

types:type.name: CompraMessage
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type CompraMessage = {| transaction: {| payment_method_token: String, amount: Number {"typeId": "int"}, currency_code: String |} |} {"example": "{\\\"transaction\\\":{\\\"payment_method_token\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"amount\\\":0,\\\"currency_code\\\":\\\"\\\"}}"}

types:type.name: Transaccion
TransaccionMessage
